bug.description:
wandb --version && python --version && uname wandb, version 0.9.1 Python 3.7.4 Linux <denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
There are two issues with the current support for gym logging. 1) Inconsistent slider steps for the video panel: The media slider does not allow to use a custom x-axix, resulting in drastic different scale of x-axis for value-based methods vs policy gradient methods. Here are some examples: <denchmark-h:h3>The video panel of DQN</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5555347/86656931-d6aeff00-bfb5-11ea-8785-6db6a47b9fd8.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h3>The video panel of PPO (PPO does less gradient update and therefore step is lower</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5555347/86657001-e4fd1b00-bfb5-11ea-837d-5a99a61d156d.png></denchmark-link>
As we can see, the slider step for the video panel is drastically different even though both scripts ran for 10M timesteps and there are roughly 17 videos for both scripts. 2) Bugs of video logging with SubprocVecEnv is a common module from (<denchmark-link:https://github.com/openai/baselines/blob/master/baselines/common/vec_env/subproc_vec_env.py>https://github.com/openai/baselines/blob/master/baselines/common/vec_env/subproc_vec_env.py</denchmark-link> ), which allows the use of subprocesses to speed up sampling collection from parallelized gym environments. However, this causes issues for wandb video logging. <denchmark-h:h3>Not using SubprocVecEnv</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://app.wandb.ai/cleanrl/cleanRL/runs/gayxplrt/overview?workspace=user-costa-huang>https://app.wandb.ai/cleanrl/cleanRL/runs/gayxplrt/overview?workspace=user-costa-huang</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5555347/86670353-8ab68700-bfc2-11ea-8b05-851736065924.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h3>Using SubprocVecEnv</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://app.wandb.ai/cleanrl/cleanRL/runs/rmqlq8m4/overview?workspace=user-costa-huang>https://app.wandb.ai/cleanrl/cleanRL/runs/rmqlq8m4/overview?workspace=user-costa-huang</denchmark-link>
When using the , not only the steps of the slider becomes incorrect. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5555347/86670459-a6ba2880-bfc2-11ea-8c8a-f6215e8aaa9f.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h3>What I Did</denchmark-h>

for info in infos: if 'episode' in info.keys(): print(f"global_step={global_step}, episode_reward={info['episode']['r']}") writer.add_scalar("charts/episode_reward", info['episode']['r'], global_step) break envs.close() writer.close() for seed in {1..1} do (sleep 0.3 && nohup xvfb-run -a python subprocessenv.py \ --gym-id BreakoutNoFrameskip-v4 \ --total-timesteps 1000000 \ --wandb-project-name cleanrl \ --use-subprocess True \ --prod-mode \ --capture-video \ --seed $seed ) >& /dev/null & done
for seed in {1..1} do (sleep 0.3 && nohup xvfb-run -a python subprocessenv.py \ --gym-id BreakoutNoFrameskip-v4 \ --total-timesteps 1000000 \ --wandb-project-name cleanrl \ --use-subprocess False \ --prod-mode \ --capture-video \ --seed $seed ) >& /dev/null & done <denchmark-h:h3>Proposed solutoin</denchmark-h>
